service_details.title: Comprehensive Service Mesh Consulting Services
service_details.subtitle: From strategy to deployment — we help you adopt, optimize, and scale your service mesh for security, performance, and reliability.

sections.title: Consulting & Advisory
sections.description: Get expert analysis of your current microservices architecture, identify bottlenecks, and define a clear service mesh roadmap.
offerings: Assess existing setup to detect performance and security gaps.
Design an adoption strategy aligned with your business goals.
Recommend the right service mesh — Istio, Linkerd, Consul, or Traefik — based on your environment.

sections.title: Deployment & Implementation
sections.description: Deploy the right service mesh with zero downtime and ensure seamless communication between services.
offerings: Install and configure Istio, Linkerd, or Consul across Kubernetes or VMs.
Enable full end-to-end encryption across all services.
Ensure reliable rollout with canary and blue-green deployments.

sections.title: Integration & Configuration
sections.description: Enhance visibility and control by integrating your mesh with monitoring, tracing, and alerting tools.
offerings: Create a unified dashboard for 360° observability and traffic control.
Identify performance bottlenecks and dependency issues in real time.
Improve reliability with intelligent traffic routing and policy-based management.

sections.title: Support & Training
sections.description: Empower your team with hands-on training and dedicated commercial support from certified mesh experts.
offerings: Continuous support for version upgrades, patches, and fixes.
In-depth workshops to build in-house mesh expertise.
Vendor-neutral guidance for optimal deployment and scaling.
